name: VR Dogs - Dog Simulation Game
description:
TRAVEL TO A BEAUTIFUL SETTING AND MEET YOUR NEW FRIENDS!
These puppies eat, drink, sleep and play with you like real dogs. And, in VR, you'll feel like they're really there!
Take a break and relax in a mountain getaway with your dog.

NO VR HEADSET? NO PROBLEM!
You can still play in Normal Mode.

CONTROLS
Pickup and throw things by looking at them and pressing your headset's button.

4 PLAYFUL BREEDS
Beagle
French Bulldog
Corgi
Pug

Like our page on Facebook and be the first to know about our upcoming games and updates! http://fb.com/tappshq
